WorldObjectDef.label: capital
WorldObjectDef.description: A massive metropolis area complete with a capitol.

WorldObjectDef.label: Farm land
WorldObjectDef.description: Sprawling farmland large enough to feed thousands.

WorldObjectDef.label: Commercial district
WorldObjectDef.description: A massive commercial district where most citizens of the capital must work.

WorldObjectDef.label: Power plant
WorldObjectDef.description: A sprawling wind farm, solar panels arrays and a large heavily guarded concrete building.

WorldObjectDef.label: Military base
WorldObjectDef.description: A very large walled area that seem to contain an airstrip, multiple hangars and several baracks. Silo doors can be seen next to a massive and ominous concrete building
